exchangeTokens(address,uint256,address,u.details: function that will allow people to exchange tokens

params._amountToSell: the amount the user wants to exchange
params._buyTokenAddress: the address of the token the user wants to obtain
params._priceOfBuyToken: price of the token that is being obtained (obtain by api call to etherscan)
params._priceOfSellToken: price of the token that is being sold (obtain by api call to etherscan)
params._sellTokenAddress: the address of the token the user wants to exchange
